version_description:
HiCoffee has now entered the 2.0 stage, there will be more useful new features coming out. Stay tuned!

New features in this release:
1. a new iOS 14 widget that shows a group of drinks that you consume regularly for quick logging.
2. new iCloud data syncing feature so you can now use any of your devices to record drinks.
3. works with iPad.

Please help HiCoffee improve by letting me know what you think via App Store comments. Thank you for your support!

- Optimize the experience of adding beverages
- Custom beverages will be displayed at the top of the list
- Brand new premium membership page
- Fix some rare crashes

- Added Nespresso Vertuo coffee data
- Widgets used a darker color in dark mode (needs to be turned on in Settings)
- Fixed an issue where custom drinks may not be displayed
- Fixed a bug in the caffeine limit prompt
- Fixed a crash issue on the latest version of the system
